tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE irrigation_needs (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name TEXT,
    soil_type TEXT,
    moisture_reading FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationNeeds (
    irrigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    date DATE,
    water_needed DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SoilMoistureReadings(sensor_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Irrigation_Zones (zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY, zone_name TEXT, moisture_threshold FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE Soil_Sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_location TEXT, sensor_status TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Moisture_Readings (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, reading_time TIMESTAMP, moisture_level FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Soil_Sensors(sensor_id));
CREATE TABLE Irrigation_Schedule (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, zone_id INT, start_time TIMESTAMP, duration INT, FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES Irrigation_Zones(zone_id));

CREATE TABLE IrrigationHistory (
    history_id UUID,
    irrigation_zone VARCHAR,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    water_amount FLOAT
);
